etymology.description: phonetic: 圥 (lù) + semantic: 土(土) (tǔ, 'earth; soil') = component in larger characters
etymology.interpretation: 坴(lù) combines semantic 土(土) (tǔ, 'earth; soil') with the phonetic 圥 to form a phono-semantic compound used within more complex characters.

examples.chinese: 在这个字中(在這個字中)，‘坴’起了音旁作用(‘坴’起了音旁作用)。
examples.pinyin: Zài zhège zì zhōng, ‘Lù’ qǐle yīnpáng zuòyòng.
examples.english: In this character, ‘坴’ functions as the phonetic component.

examples.chinese: ‘坴’是构字的一个组成部分(‘坴’是構字的一個組成部分)。
examples.pinyin: ‘Lù’ shì gòuzì de yīgè zǔchéng bùfèn.
examples.english: ‘坴’ is a component in character formation.
